overview: Through the process of mutual recognition and domestication of two generations of swordsmen and a knife, it tells the story of the protagonist Agou in the troubled times. After experiencing some fights and disputes in the rivers and lakes, he discovered and had the courage to change himself. This is an inspirational story of an unknown little beggar with low self-esteem who grows up to be a hero who cares about the world and saves the world for the people.
title: Soul of Blades
